settings.title-Hero: Fresh  Mediterranean  street wraps  falaFULL of flavor

settings.text-taste: We aim to make your tastebuds feel some type of way. Each wrap starts with our authentic freshly made falafel patty and is then smothered in one of our award winning spreads before being hand rolled in a soft chewy whole-wheat tortilla.

settings.title-fresh: A fresh look at an ancient food
settings.text-fresh: Bring the freshness of a East Mediterranean classic, falafel, into your kitchen. Our convenient falafel street wraps are filled with honest ingredients, made from ancient recipes, prepared fresh, packed carefully, and sent straight to your door. Transport your taste buds to where these flavors all began. Let’s party like it's thirteen ninety-nine!

settings.text-variety: Sometimes you open the fridge for the fifth time in a row and find yourself staring into the abyss of your fully stocked shelves. You’re not bored, you’re just tired of eating boring food. You're also probably indecisive like us, which is why you should order ALL the flavors we have.

settings.text-high: Not to brag, but we don’t take shortcuts. We bring dried chickpeas in-house and soak them ourselves so that we can produce our homemade falafels and hummus using the most natural ingredients. Combine that with our fresh selection of bell peppers, lemons, red onions, and garlic cloves -- and you can taste the difference. We don’t cut corners, we cut fresh ingredients.
settings.text-high-mobile: Not to brag, but we don’t take shortcuts. We bring dried chickpeas and soak them ourselves so that we can make our falafels and hummus fresh in-house. We don’t cut corners, we cut fresh ingredients.
